data.content:
So here we are on Lesson 10. Do you know how many stories you have heard so far?
You have heard about boys and girls. They love dancing in the rain and planting trees. They have Grandmas who give them special gifts.
Well, you are about to meet an adventure-loving, super-ambitious, clever, intelligent girl called Tara. She is all grown up and she is a PHOTOGRAPHER!
She is not afraid to travel on her own. She enjoys sleeping under the stars.
Hmm... I won't tell you more. I'm sure you are excited to know more.
Let us watch and listen to this story. And then we can begin some new activities today!
You can listen to the audio again by clicking on the Play button.
